name: Calendar Backup File
summary: Learn about .ICBU files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can export a calendar to an ICBU archive by selecting File → Export... → Calendar Archive... in Calendar. The ICBU archive is a macOS package with the .icbu extension, containing subfolders for each calendar and .SQLITEDB and .PLIST files storing event data. In older versions of Apple Calendar, the archive contains .ICS files instead of SQLite databases.
NOTE: Calendar was formerly known as iCal, but Apple changed it in 2012 with the release of OS X Mountain Lion.

instructions: You can open ICBU files with Apple Calendar in macOS. To open an ICBU file with Calendar, select File → Import.
When restoring backups, Calendar overwrites all existing calendar data. The program prompts the user to overwrite the data before performing the operation.
Apple Calendar can convert ICBU files to .ICS files. To do so, open an ICBU file with Calendar and then select File → Export → Export.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
